title: Australia vs Papua New Guinea in rugby league
text:
Australia vs Papua New Guinea in rugby league is a rivalry between the <a href="Australia%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Australia national rugby league team</a> and the <a href="Papua%20New%20Guinea%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Papua New Guinea national rugby league team</a> in the sport of <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a>. The first match between the two sides was in 1982, with the Kangaroos coming out with a 38–2 victory. They have played each other ten times, with Australia winning each match-up by at least 22 points.
The Home and Away labels are technical terms, and may not reflect the actual home team in the match (e.g. 2008 World Cup).
